Job Posting:174358 - Position: W26 Developer Intern - App Launcher - Winter 2026 174358B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Winter App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 10/24/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 10/10/2025 04:25 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 Address Line 2 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country 1Password 4711 Yonge Street 10th Floor Toronto M2N 6K8 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description About 1Password 2026 - Winter W26 Developer Intern - App Launcher - Winter 2026 174358B Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List At 1Password, we're building the foundation for a safe, productive digital future. Our mission is to unleash employee productivity without compromising security by ensuring every identity is authentic, every application sign-in is secure, and every device is trusted. We innovated the market-leading enterprise password manager and pioneered Extended Access Management, a new cybersecurity category built for the way people and AI agents work today. As one of the most loved brands in cybersecurity, we take a human-centric approach in everything from product strategy to user experience. Over 175,000 businesses and millions of people trust us to provide seamless, secure access to their most critical information. If you're excited about the opportunity to contribute to the digital safety of millions, to work alongside a team of curious, driven individuals, and to solve hard problems in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, then we want to hear from you. Come join us and help shape a safer, simpler digital future. The App Launcher team is responsible for building the front door to 1Password's XAM offerings for businesses. The App Launcher gives employees a single, centralized starting point to access their IdP?managed apps and their 1Password items, so they can launch what they need faster with fewer clicks. It reduces friction throughout the workday by auto?populating known apps, streamlining sign?ins, and bringing search and shortcuts into one place. This is a remote opportunity within Canada. This position will be for 4 months - January to April 2026. What you can expect: • Write efficient, scalable, and robust customer-facing features in one or more of our web or Rust tech stacks. • Collaborate with people across the company like Product Design, Marketing, Sales, Customer Support, Quality Assurance, and other Software Development teams. • Focus on building and optimizing features in our extension, new tab page and other parts of client apps Job Requirements What we're looking for: • Confidence: A willingness to take on new challenges, and see them through to completion. • Humility: You're not afraid to ask "stupid" questions and make mistakes (as long as you learn from them). • • Curiosity: You look for better ways of doing things, even if everyone seems happy with how they are. Teamwork: We work together, and succeed as a team! Bonus points for: • Someone interested in working in multiple tech stacks. • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. We're a distributed team so written communication in particular is very crucial. • Someone who thinks about the impact of their work in terms of the end user. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Developer Intern - App Launcher - Winter 2026 @ 1Password Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
